TestCase.name: testMoreThen[mode = BATCH]
TestCase.Resource: select * from A join B on a0 = b0 and a0 > 0

LogicalProject(a0=[$0], b0=[$1]) +- LogicalJoin(condition=[AND(=($0, $1), >($0, 0))], joinType=[inner]) :- LogicalTableScan(table=[[default_catalog, default_database, A]]) +- LogicalTableScan(table=[[default_catalog, default_database, B]])

HashJoin(joinType=[InnerJoin], where=[=(a0, b0)], select=[a0, b0], build=[right]) :- Exchange(distribution=[hash[a0]]) : +- Calc(select=[a0], where=[>(a0, 0)]) : +- TableSourceScan(table=[[default_catalog, default_database, A, filter=[]]], fields=[a0]) +- Exchange(distribution=[hash[b0]]) +- Calc(select=[b0], where=[>(b0, 0)]) +- TableSourceScan(table=[[default_catalog, default_database, B, filter=[]]], fields=[b0])

TestCase.name: testMoreThen[mode = STREAM]
TestCase.Resource: select * from A join B on a0 = b0 and a0 > 0

LogicalProject(a0=[$0], b0=[$1]) +- LogicalJoin(condition=[AND(=($0, $1), >($0, 0))], joinType=[inner]) :- LogicalTableScan(table=[[default_catalog, default_database, A]]) +- LogicalTableScan(table=[[default_catalog, default_database, B]])

Join(joinType=[InnerJoin], where=[=(a0, b0)], select=[a0, b0], leftInputSpec=[NoUniqueKey], rightInputSpec=[NoUniqueKey]) :- Exchange(distribution=[hash[a0]]) : +- Calc(select=[a0], where=[>(a0, 0)]) : +- TableSourceScan(table=[[default_catalog, default_database, A, filter=[]]], fields=[a0]) +- Exchange(distribution=[hash[b0]]) +- Calc(select=[b0], where=[>(b0, 0)]) +- TableSourceScan(table=[[default_catalog, default_database, B, filter=[]]], fields=[b0])

TestCase.name: testNotEquals[mode = STREAM]
TestCase.Resource: select * from A join B on a0 = b0 and a0 <> 0

LogicalProject(a0=[$0], b0=[$1]) +- LogicalJoin(condition=[AND(=($0, $1), <>($0, 0))], joinType=[inner]) :- LogicalTableScan(table=[[default_catalog, default_database, A]]) +- LogicalTableScan(table=[[default_catalog, default_database, B]])

Join(joinType=[InnerJoin], where=[=(a0, b0)], select=[a0, b0], leftInputSpec=[NoUniqueKey], rightInputSpec=[NoUniqueKey]) :- Exchange(distribution=[hash[a0]]) : +- Calc(select=[a0], where=[<>(a0, 0)]) : +- TableSourceScan(table=[[default_catalog, default_database, A, filter=[]]], fields=[a0]) +- Exchange(distribution=[hash[b0]]) +- Calc(select=[b0], where=[<>(b0, 0)]) +- TableSourceScan(table=[[default_catalog, default_database, B, filter=[]]], fields=[b0])

TestCase.name: testNotEquals[mode = BATCH]
TestCase.Resource: select * from A join B on a0 = b0 and a0 <> 0

LogicalProject(a0=[$0], b0=[$1]) +- LogicalJoin(condition=[AND(=($0, $1), <>($0, 0))], joinType=[inner]) :- LogicalTableScan(table=[[default_catalog, default_database, A]]) +- LogicalTableScan(table=[[default_catalog, default_database, B]])

HashJoin(joinType=[InnerJoin], where=[=(a0, b0)], select=[a0, b0], build=[right]) :- Exchange(distribution=[hash[a0]]) : +- Calc(select=[a0], where=[<>(a0, 0)]) : +- TableSourceScan(table=[[default_catalog, default_database, A, filter=[]]], fields=[a0]) +- Exchange(distribution=[hash[b0]]) +- Calc(select=[b0], where=[<>(b0, 0)]) +- TableSourceScan(table=[[default_catalog, default_database, B, filter=[]]], fields=[b0])
